title: sunnyjoys
author: sunnyjoys
created_time: December 13, 2023, 02:44:04 AMLast edit: December 13, 2023, 03:05:21 AM by sunnyjoys
content: Hi all,I have some BSV in Coinbase and need to transfer them to another wallet by Jan. Any valid and trustable wallet you can recommend? I tried Exodus and Coinomi but they don't work.Many thanks,

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Coinomi is the best choice for BSV and I don't get what you mean by they don't work? Can you elaborate about not working part...I found an interesting wallet called ElectrumSV and looks like exact replica of Electrum and claims to be open source, so you can try that and it may work.Github: https://github.com/electrumsv/electrumsvDownload here: https://electrumsv.io/download.html

comments.author: sunnyjoys
comments.body: BSV was delisted from Coinomi app and they are no longer running nodes. https://www.reddit.com/r/bitcoincashSV/comments/udybki/coinomi_confirms_delisting_of_bsv_as_final_false/Quote from: jrrsparkles on December 13, 2023, 06:06:35 AMCoinomi is the best choice for BSV and I don't get what you mean by they don't work? Can you elaborate about not working part...I found an interesting wallet called ElectrumSV and looks like exact replica of Electrum and claims to be open source, so you can try that and it may work.Github: https://github.com/electrumsv/electrumsvDownload here: https://electrumsv.io/download.html

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Not many here use BSV but, I remember that Atomic Wallet does support the BSV blockchain. You can check the following link for more information. They both have desktop and mobile versions of their wallet. Exodus Wallet is another wallet that supports BSV but, in 2020 there was a post published on the forum that was a warning to not use the wallet due risk of the wallet exchange. Risks of the Exodus Exchange function ("CoinSwitch Scam"), so keep that in mind if you download the Exodus wallet.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: sunnyjoys on December 13, 2023, 02:44:04 AMHi all,I have some BSV in Coinbase and need to transfer them to another wallet by Jan. Any valid and trustable wallet you can recommend? I tried Exodus and Coinomi but they don't work.Many thanks,I see no point in keeping this currency, as it is removed from many central exchanges and liquidity decreases, which makes withdrawing it to any wallet and reselling it again difficult due to the lack of platforms that list it.If you prefer an open source wallet, there it is electrumsvIf you prefer a closed source wallet, there it is Trust walletCoinomi development was stopped more than a year ago. The wallet is closed source and there may be security problems. It is best to delete it and transfer your currencies to a new wallet.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: If you really want to keep this shitcoin: create a good old paper wallet with a legacy Bitcoin address. Don't use any of the scam websites, you could just use Bitcoin Core or Electrum to create a legacy Bitcoin address. Back it up, and send your BSV there.That takes the rush out of your January deadline.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Many of the wallet is broken.Most people will recommend you (Electrum SV, Atomic Wallet, Coinomi, Exodus) but since most of the wallets are broken, not supported anymore. If you ask, recommended wallet at this time (none). I agree with what @LoyceV created a paper wallet is a good option.Until you find suitable wallet in the future.

comments.author: sunnyjoys
comments.body: Thanks. Never want to keep my BSV. Just transfer BSV coins out of Coinbase and swap them to BTC or ETH if possible. They came free since I own Bitcoin cash before.Quote from: Husires on December 13, 2023, 08:46:25 AMQuote from: sunnyjoys on December 13, 2023, 02:44:04 AMHi all,I have some BSV in Coinbase and need to transfer them to another wallet by Jan. comments.body: Thanks. It will be my last resort before trying to transfer and swap. comments.author: sunnyjoys
comments.body: I just tried Rock Wallet. Looks good for BSV. Any one has experience?

comments.author: Oneandpure
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 13, 2023, 07:31:50 AMNot many here use BSV but, I remember that Atomic Wallet does support the BSV blockchain. You can check the following link for more information. They both have desktop and mobile versions of their wallet. Exodus Wallet is another wallet that supports BSV but, in 2020 there was a post published on the forum that was a warning to not use the wallet due risk of the wallet exchange. Risks of the Exodus Exchange function ("CoinSwitch Scam"), so keep that in mind if you download the Exodus wallet. I don't think recommended with atomic wallet for saving BSV coin have hacked cases last several months on Augustus and over 100 million dollar crypto hacked. After hacking cases not update yet about that wallet are recovery and can use again for saving assets or not?I checked at google have six wallet recommended for BSV and seems its update last several months will available for holding BSV coin there or not. Electrum SV (Desktop Wallet)Exodus (Desktop & Mobile)Coinomi (Mobile & Desktop Wallet)CentBee (Mobile Wallet)Edge Wallet (Mobile)Guarda Wallet (Multiple Devices)For OP you can read details here about 6 recommended BSV wallet and check which one wallet more recommended and easily operated with your mobile phone or your computer.Best Bitcoin SV Wallets: Top 6 Safest Places to Store BSV
